name: aspear-berry
effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures freezing.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A hold item that
defrosts POKéMON
in battle.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A hold item that
defrosts POKéMON
in battle.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
When held by a POKéMON, it will be
used in battle for defrosting.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A Poffin ingredient. It may be used
or held by a Pokémon to defrost it.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
It may be used or held by a Pokémon to
defrost it.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
If held by a Pokémon,
it defrosts it.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
If held by a Pokémon,
it defrosts it.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon.
If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover
from being frozen on its own in battle.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its
own in battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its
own in battle.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its
own in battle.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon
holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its
own in battle.

fling_effect: Immediately activates the berry's effect on the target.
